name: All Media Downloader
description: This API is used for downloading media from the internet. Supports: Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Likee, Vimeo, Reddit, Twitter, Facebook, etc. Just name them!

api_methods.name: Download
api_methods.description: There is only one endpoint, i.e the base endpoint. Just send the request with your url, I handle the rest.

api_methods.name: Downloader
api_methods.description:
This is the endpoint for scraping. Just pass your URL as request form body(not JSON).
This endpoint provides more info about the media. 
24/7 up time
